Screenwriter: Michelangelo Antonioni, Michelangelo Antonioni, Fred Gardner, Sam Shepard, Tonino Guerra, Clare Peploe
Distributor: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Distributing Corp., United International Pictures
Synopsis: A fugitive campus radical (Mark Frechette) steals a plane and meets a secretary (Daria Halprin) in Death Valley.
Title: Zabriskie Point
